recipe.title: Zucchini Enchilada Roll-Ups Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups ; shredded monterey jack cheese, divided ; (200 g)

steps.step: In a bowl mix together chicken, onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno, 1 cup of Monterey Jack (100 g), enchilada sauce, lime juice, garlic powder, chili powder, salt, pepper. Mix thoroughly and set aside until ready to use.
With a peeler, peel slices of zucchini vertically. Once you can no longer peel a whole slice of zucchini peel the rest into smaller strips and save for zoodles!
Spread chicken mixture on to a slice of zucchini and roll into a tight spiral.
Place in a greased springform pan and bake for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with the rest of the cheese and bake for 10 more minutes until cheese has melted.
Transfer to a plate and sprinkle with cilantro.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl mix together chicken, onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno, 1 cup of Monterey Jack (100 g), enchilada sauce, lime juice, garlic powder, chili powder, salt, pepper.
Mix thoroughly and set aside until ready to use.
With a peeler, peel slices of zucchini vertically.
Once you can no longer peel a whole slice of zucchini peel the rest into smaller strips and save for zoodles!
Spread chicken mixture on to a slice of zucchini and roll into a tight spiral.
Place in a greased springform pan and bake for 15 minutes.
Sprinkle with the rest of the cheese and bake for 10 more minutes until cheese has melted.
Transfer to a plate and sprinkle with cilantro.
